name: Captain NinjaBeard
description:
A game I made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare, with the theme being Only 2 Buttons.  It's an arcade arena shooter where you use your pistol and your katana to fight enemies and move around the screen.  The game is played with the mouse only using the left and right mouse buttons.

Postcompo version has improved visuals, a combo meter, and 360 controller support.
